product_name: Karndean Commercial - Luxury Vinyl Tile - Korlok - Rigid Core (Stone Tiles)
product_description: Premium resilient 5G rigid core hybrid LVT with enhanced acoustic benefits, secure installation
recyclable_offcuts_description: Yes, we are a founding member of ResiLoop Limited, Australia’s first national stewardship scheme for resilient flooring. Established by the Australian Resilient Flooring Association (ARFA), ResiLoop provides an industry-wide take-back and recycling program, ensuring resilient flooring waste is diverted from landfill and reprocessed for reuse, supporting the circular economy.
reusable_description: Karndean flooring is designed for long-term durability, but its ability to be reused depends on the installation method. Our LooseLay and Rigid Core products are more suited to potential uplift and reinstallation, provided they are carefully removed and the subfloor conditions are appropriate. However, Gluedown products are designed for a permanent bond, making reuse more challenging. If demountability is a key requirement, we recommend LooseLay for its ease of removal and reinstallation.
end_of_life_program_description: Yes, we are a founding member of ResiLoop Limited, Australia’s first national stewardship scheme for resilient flooring. Established by the Australian Resilient Flooring Association (ARFA), ResiLoop provides an industry-wide take-back and recycling program, ensuring resilient flooring waste is diverted from landfill and reprocessed for reuse, supporting the circular economy.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, we use factories that have closed-loop water systems some of which use 100% recycled water for industrial processes
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: We partner exclusively with logistics providers that have committed to science-based targets for reducing their emissions, ensuring a more sustainable delivery process.
minimisation_design_strategy: The modular nature of the product inherently minimises wastage by optimising material use and reducing offcuts.
modern_slavery_comments: Yes, for information, please contact your Business Manager, who can provide more details.
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Manufacturing: we require each factory we use to have a programme in place to prevent the release of microplastics during production. After end of life: risk of environmental pollution if incinerated or landfilled at end of life.
factory_finished_description: Karndean’s K-Guard+® surface protection is a premium polyurethane coating designed to enhance durability, performance, and ease of maintenance. Engineered for commercial environments, this advanced finish provides superior resistance against scuffs, stains, and wear, ensuring a long-lasting, low-maintenance flooring solution.
specific_installation_methods: Hard-set adhesives and cementitious screed/levelling compounds are commonly used for installation.
other_comments: For tailored advice on how Karndean can support your project, contact your Karndean Business Manager or visit karndeancommercial.com
type_of_packaging: Transport and distribution packaging includes recycled cardboard boxes, reusable pallets, plastic wrap, and strapping.

end_of_life_program_description: Yes, we are a founding member of ResiLoop Limited, Australia’s first national stewardship scheme for resilient flooring. Established by the Australian Resilient Flooring Association (ARFA), ResiLoop provides an industry-wide take-back and recycling program, ensuring resilient flooring waste is diverted from landfill and reprocessed for reuse, supporting the circular economy.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, our manufacturing partners operate closed-loop water systems, with some facilities using 100% recycled water for industrial processes, significantly reducing reliance on potable water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: We partner exclusively with logistics providers that have committed to science-based targets for reducing their emissions, ensuring a more sustainable delivery process.
minimisation_design_strategy: The modular nature of the product inherently minimises wastage by optimising material use and reducing offcuts.
modern_slavery_comments: Yes, for information, please contact your Business Manager, who can provide more details.
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Manufacturing: we require each factory we use to have a programme in place to prevent the release of microplastics during production. After end of life: risk of environmental pollution if incinerated or landfilled at end of life.
factory_finished_description: Karndean’s K-Guard+® surface protection is a premium polyurethane coating designed to enhance durability, performance, and ease of maintenance. Engineered for commercial environments, this advanced finish provides superior resistance against scuffs, stains, and wear, ensuring a long-lasting, low-maintenance flooring solution.
specific_installation_methods: Hard-set adhesives and cementitious screed/levelling compounds are commonly used for installation.
other_comments: For tailored advice on how Karndean can support your project, contact your Karndean Business Manager or visit karndeancommercial.com
type_of_packaging: Transport and distribution packaging includes recycled cardboard boxes, reusable pallets, plastic wrap, and strapping.

reusable_description: Karndean flooring is designed for long-term durability, but its ability to be reused depends on the installation method. Our LooseLay and Rigid Core products are more suited to potential uplift and reinstallation, provided they are carefully removed and the subfloor conditions are appropriate. However, Gluedown products are designed for a permanent bond, making reuse more challenging. If demountability is a key requirement, we recommend LooseLay for its ease of removal and reinstallation.
end_of_life_program_description: Yes, we are a founding member of ResiLoop Limited, Australia’s first national stewardship scheme for resilient flooring. Established by the Australian Resilient Flooring Association (ARFA) and supported by the Australian Government, ResiLoop provides an industry-wide take-back and recycling program, ensuring resilient flooring waste is diverted from landfill and reprocessed for reuse, supporting the circular economy.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, our manufacturing partners operate closed-loop water systems, with some facilities using 100% recycled water for industrial processes, significantly reducing reliance on potable water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: We partner exclusively with logistics providers that have committed to science-based targets for reducing their emissions, ensuring a more sustainable delivery process.
minimisation_design_strategy: The modular nature of the product inherently minimises wastage by optimising material use and reducing off-cuts.
modern_slavery_comments: Yes, for information, please contact your Business Manager, who can provide more details.
risk_of_harm_posed_description: Manufacturing: we require each factory we use to have a programme in place to prevent the release of microplastics during production. After end of life: risk of environmental pollution if incinerated or landfilled at end of life.
factory_finished_description: Karndean’s K-Guard+® surface protection is a premium polyurethane coating designed to enhance durability, performance, and ease of maintenance. Engineered for commercial environments, this advanced finish provides superior resistance against scuffs, stains, and wear, ensuring a long-lasting, low-maintenance flooring solution.
specific_installation_methods: Hard-set adhesives and cementitious screed/levelling compounds are commonly used for installation.
other_comments: For tailored advice on how Karndean can support your project, contact your Karndean Business Manager or visit karndeancommercial.com
type_of_packaging: Transport and distribution packaging includes recycled cardboard boxes, reusable pallets, plastic wrap, and strapping.
